synopsis.text: Louise, Huntley, and Smudger are three young rebels determined to challenge the oppressive regime of the Good For You Party, which has outlawed all sweets, including chocolate, in the name of health and wellness. As the family bakery crumbles under the weight of the new laws, the trio discovers a hidden cocoa shop deep within an abandoned mine. In a daring act of defiance, they form their own secret chocolate distribution network, risking everything to bring back the joy of sweet treats to their community. Based on Alex Shearer's Bootleg, this anime adaptation promises a thrilling and heartwarming tale of friendship and courage in the face of adversity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
